channel.title: RewindScape 2006 [VPS][24/7][NOLAG]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://pkgamers.no-ip.info/images/logo.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/29az33c.jpg[/img] Website : [url=http://pkgamers.no-ip.info/]http://pkgamers.no-ip.info/[/url] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/r22l2u.png[/img] PlayNow : [url=http://pkgamers.no-ip.info/playnow.php]http://pkgamers.no-ip.info/playnow.php[/url]
[size=10pt][b]Photos are updated with new screenshots of current version. We do have bugs and we are in fact working on a complete remake scheduled for release any day now. I thank all the people who wished us good luck and I want to say that if you have nothing good to say about our server, say nothing at all. Once again, we hope you check RewindScape out and a big thank you goes to all the supporters!![/b][/size]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/xpq81y.png[/img] [B]Features :[/B]
RANDOM EVENTS CLUE SCROLL SYSTEM 8 QUESTS ADDED 40% OF ALL RUNESCAPE WORLD IS DONE 80% OF ALL RUNESCAPE SHOPS ARE ADDED ALL DOORS WORKING ALL DUNGEONS ADDED FULL RUNESCAPE ECONOMY 1X EXP RATES 3X BONUS EXP RATES CLIENT MUSIC ALL MINI-GAMES ADDED
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/xpq81y.png[/img] [B]Towns :[/B]
Full Varrock Full Falador Full Lumbridge Full Al-Kharid Full Draynor Full Karamja Full Ardounge Full Port Sarim Full Edgeville Full Seers Full Camelot Full Karamja Full Wilderness Full Baganoth and much much more! Specials and Skillcapes work.
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/xpq81y.png[/img] [B]Skills :[/B]
ALL 24 SKILLS ARE WORKING, SOME NEED WORK
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/xpq81y.png[/img] [B]Pictures:[/B]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/10pozle.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1vw45.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5vt8p5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2n51zp.png[/img] [/CENTER]
CREDITS : CreativeScape (R0cky 0wnz)

item.title: RewindScape 2006 [VPS][24/7][NOLAG]
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“dimaskas, post:18, topic:459320”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=562225.msg4101720#msg4101720 date=1347574363]
Logged onto this server, and nothing seems to have been changed. “Visit cataclysm.org for information.”
I then offered to help, and he banned me.
[/quote]

all i can say i didn’t ban you , u sed bye that’s all and btw we are moving to a new source i got a coder idk if he is better than you but he just talk to me normally and repect me as a person .[/quote]

I’m sorry man, it’s just you used ::pnpc to become a dagannoth and so I thought you were a dagannoth. If you had just become a black knight then I would have known you were a human and spoken to you as one

Read full topic

item.title: RewindScape 2006 [VPS][24/7][NOLAG]
item.dc:creator: @smittyy smittyy
item.description:
@smittyy wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:15, topic:459320”][quote author=smittyy link=topic=562225.msg4101636#msg4101636 date=1347566008]

Why are we showing us skills? Doens’t every single server have skills ?

All I can say is… NOOB

I see you are great at defending your point.
[/quote]
It’s not because every server has skills, that all servers are the same piece of ripped code.
Could be rewritten, extra/unique content can be added, improvements.[/quote]

Good point but this server doesn’t prove this. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:1, topic:459647”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=562225.msg4101549#msg4101549 date=1347556352]

Why are we showing us skills? Doens’t every single server have skills ?

All I can say is… NOOB

Depends if it has been rewritten or not, it might look the same but when it has been redone it’s always worth showing off.
You could say that we shouldn’t have a development section anymore due most has been done already.

item.title: RewindScape 2006 [VPS][24/7][NOLAG]
item.dc:creator: @dimaskas dimaskas
item.description:
@dimaskas wrote:

[CENTER]

Website : http://pkgamers.no-ip.info/
PlayNow : http://pkgamers.no-ip.info/playnow.php

[size=10pt]Photos are updated with new screenshots of current version. We do have bugs and we are in fact working on a complete remake scheduled for release any day now. I thank all the people who wished us good luck and I want to say that if you have nothing good to say about our server, say nothing at all. Once again, we hope you check RewindScape out and a big thank you goes to all the supporters!![/size]

Features :

RANDOM EVENTS
CLUE SCROLL SYSTEM
8 QUESTS ADDED
40% OF ALL RUNESCAPE WORLD IS DONE
80% OF ALL RUNESCAPE SHOPS ARE ADDED
ALL DOORS WORKING
ALL DUNGEONS ADDED
FULL RUNESCAPE ECONOMY
1X EXP RATES 3X BONUS EXP RATES
CLIENT MUSIC
ALL MINI-GAMES ADDED

Towns :

Full Varrock
Full Falador
Full Lumbridge
Full Al-Kharid
Full Draynor
Full Karamja
Full Ardounge
Full Port Sarim
Full Edgeville
Full Seers
Full Camelot
Full Karamja
Full Wilderness
Full Baganoth and much much more!
Specials and Skillcapes work.

Skills :

ALL 24 SKILLS ARE WORKING, SOME NEED WORK

Pictures:





[/CENTER]
